uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.binFileReader
Class FileByteReader

java.lang.Object
  uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.binFileReader.AbstractByteReader
      uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.binFileReader.FileByteReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ByteReader
public class FileByteReader
extends AbstractByteReader

The FileByteReader class is a ByteReader that reads its data from a file.

This class can have two files associated with it: The file represented by it (its IdentificationFile) and a (possibly different) backing file. The purpose of this separation is so that this object can represent a URL that has been downloaded or an InputStream that has been saved to disk.

Author:
linb

setFileMarker

public void setFileMarker(long markerPosition)
Position the file marker at a given byte position.

The file marker is used to record how far through the file the byte sequence matching algorithm has got.

Parameters:
markerPosition - The byte number in the file at which to position the marker

public long getFileMarker()
Gets the current position of the file marker.

the current position of the file marker
